common.description: WeCV AI is a free, open-source smart resume builder with AI polishing, multi-language support, and local data storage. No registration required, make your resume more professional.

items.question: Is We CV free to use?
items.answer: We CV is completely free and includes professional resume creation features. We are committed to keeping core features free forever, enabling everyone to create professional resumes.

items.question: Is my resume data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely secure. We CV uses local storage technology, meaning all your data stays on your own device without any cloud uploads. You have complete control over your personal information.

items.question: What export formats are supported?
items.answer: We support standard PDF export format, ensuring your resume maintains consistent professional formatting across all devices. We also support JSON format export for easy backup and migration of your resume data.

items.question: How can I sync across devices?
items.answer: We provide convenient JSON configuration export, allowing you to save and import your resume settings on any device. You can also set up local folder backup for added data security.

items.question: What customization options are available?
items.answer: We CV offers rich personalization options, including multiple professional templates, custom color themes, flexible layout adjustments, font settings, and more. You can create a unique resume style based on your preferences and industry requirements.

user1.name: John Smith
user1.content: We CV helped me quickly create a professional resume. The AI suggestions made my resume stand out. Highly recommended!

user2.name: Lisa Brown
user2.content: The interface is clean and powerful. Local storage makes me feel safe about my data. Great job!

user3.name: David Lee
user3.content: Lots of templates and real-time preview. PDF export quality is excellent, ready to use for job applications.

commitment.title: Privacy Protection Commitment
commitment.content: WeCV AI is committed to protecting your privacy. We use local storage technology to ensure that your resume data is completely stored on your device and will not be uploaded to our servers.

localStorage.title: Local Data Storage
localStorage.content: Your resume data is completely stored in your browser's local storage, including:

technicalData.title: Technical Data Collection
technicalData.content: To provide better service, we may collect the following technical information:

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use multiple security measures to protect your data:
measures: Local storage: All resume data is stored locally on your device and will not be transmitted to our servers
HTTPS encryption: All data transmission uses HTTPS encryption
No server storage: We do not store your personal resume data on servers
Regular cleanup: Technical logs are regularly cleaned and do not retain sensitive information

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.content: We use the following technologies to improve user experience:
technologies: Local Storage: Store your resume data and settings
Session Storage: Temporarily store session information
Cookies: Only used to remember your language preferences and theme settings
cookies.note: You can clear this data at any time through your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may use the following third-party services to improve user experience:
services: AI services: For grammar checking and content optimization (only when you actively use them)
Analytics tools: To understand website usage (anonymous data)
thirdParty.note: These third-party services have their own privacy policies. We recommend reviewing the relevant terms.

dataControl.title: Data Export and Deletion
dataControl.content: You have complete control over your data:
rights: Data export: You can export your resume data at any time
Data deletion: You can clear local data in your browser at any time
Data backup: We recommend regularly backing up important resume data

children.title: Children's Privacy Protection
children.content: Our service is not directed to children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we discover that we have collected personal information from children under 13, we will immediately delete such information.

updates.title: Privacy Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page and the "Last Updated" date will be updated at the top of the page. We recommend reviewing this privacy policy regularly to stay informed of any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or suggestions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the following methods:

promise.title: Privacy Protection Promise
promise.content: We promise: Your resume data will never leave your device. We will not collect, store, or share your personal resume information. Your privacy and security are our top priority.
